name: Model Coordination API Sample - View of Clash data
description: This repository demonstrates basic viewing of clash raw data by Model Coordination API. It lists all clash instances data, and allows the user to click one instance to highlight within APS Viewer.

APS_CLIENT_ID.description: APS Client ID. Ensure this ID also provisions with BIM 360 account

APS_CALLBACK_URL.description: Callback URL of your APS app, required for 3-legged OAuth
